text:
@realDonaldTrump 4 weeks ago, there were 938 U.S. coronavirus deaths. Today, there are now 54,530 confirmed U.S. deaths.

In 1 month, over 53,000 Americans have died. Mothers, fathers, sons, daughters, brothers, sisters.

Not ONE word of sympathy from you. 

YOU don't care. Never did. Despicable.
